revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Rocket Game Corner |image = [[File:Rocket Game Corner.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Rocket Game Corner. |tokens = 625 |location = Celadon City }} The '''Rocket Game Corner''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 5,820 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=21|<center> N/A || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop, [[File:Machop.png|40px]] Machop |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Raticate.png|40px]] Raticate, [[File:Drowzee.png|40px]] Drowzee |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew, [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans, [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sandslash |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans, [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew, [[File:Arbok.png|40px]] Arbok |}

Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || N/A || 37.48% || 36.00% || 30.00% |- | {{Bag2|Lucky Incense}} || N/A || 37.48% || 36.00% || 30.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Pokéball}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.20% || 10.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || 2 || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.99% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.25% || 0.40% || 1.00% |- | {{Bag2|Nestball}} || N/A || 0.25% || 0.40% || 1.00% |- | align="center" colspan=5| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.07% || 0.35% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.07% || 0.35% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || <0.01% || 0.07% || 0.35% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:9-->
<!--T:10--> After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:11--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
